description: Certain NETGEAR devices are affected by stored XSS. This affects D7800 before 1.0.1.56, RBK50 before 2.3.5.30, RBR50 before 2.3.5.30, RBS50 before 2.3.5.30, RBK40 before 2.3.5.30, RBR40 before 2.3.5.30, RBS40 before 2.3.5.30, RBK20 before 2.3.5.26, RBR20 before 2.3.5.26, RBS20 before 2.3.5.26, XR700 before 1.0.1.10, R7500v2 before 1.0.3.46, R7800 before 1.0.2.74, R8900 before 1.0.4.28, R9000 before 1.0.4.28, XR500 before 2.3.2.56, and RAX120 before 1.0.0.78.
